website_summaries.verdict: Great value for a single, standard 5-gallon HDPE bucket with a top handle.
pros: Very low price compared to other HDPE buckets
Offers a commonly used 5-gallon size to accommodate many different items
Bucket's 70-mil thickness maintains wall strength for stacking the buckets
Product is made in the United States, which means you can trust the materials used
cons: Does not ship with a lid
Walls could be thicker to better accommodate heavy loads

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: This bucket is large enough to hold all of my hopes, wishes, and dreams, but it will be used in one hand to house a bag while pooper scooper to pick up dog poop in the other! The color of the bucket is a magnificent pure snow white that shines in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: techsuprmomma

customer_reviews.title: Not completely plain.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously if you just want a bucket, this is great. However, I'm using it as a planter. The bucket is not plain white as it is pictured and described. There is a huge, unremovable caution for drowning marking. I was able to cover it with several coats of spray paint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, love the handle and design
customer_reviews.text: Strong handle, there is a plastic round lip inside of upper part of pail to prevent liquid spills. Inexpensive..yet excellent quality and BPA free! Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Cnmn

customer_reviews.title: Fine bucket but much shorter and slimmer than normal ones (grit guard doesn't quite fit)
customer_reviews.text: Reviews are wrong, this bucket is much shorter and smaller than the others I had bought from the same company. Unlike the other buckets the grit guard does not fit all the way on the bottom but you can smash it in there you will just be left with about a 2-4 inch gap unless you cut out the outer ring. For some that might work but I just wanted to clarify those 2 items. otherwise the bucket will be used for car washing so that job it does well.
customer_reviews.author: PrimeOne

customer_reviews.title: Not a plain bucket.
customer_reviews.text: If I wanted a bucket with a large state of Texas symbol on it, I would have looked for one. Otherwise, it a bucket. Nothing in the description says it comes with any graphics. If it did, you should have some choices.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Haley

customer_reviews.title: A great size and very useful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bucket and I have 3 now because there are many uses for it. At present one is holding my potting soil for starting tomatoes. Another contains 7 garden tools --pruners, small and large, a hand rake, a small pruning saw and seed packets. A third awaits its usefulness by being ready to protect my outside plants from the predicted heavy snow. This bucket is also easy to clean in my sink and a 5 gallon one would not be. It is sturdy, easy to carry and stackable. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: PAG

customer_reviews.title: This is a 5 gallon bucket that works.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bucket. Works as promised. I’m not five stars excited about this bucket, it’s a bucket, but when compared to its bucket peers it shines. So I gave it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonTarget

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Food grade not that I use it for that, but I’m a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bucket
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty bucket. Using it to store car wash mix in between washes. Gamma Seal fits just like on a 5 gallon bucket. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: bookwormTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I expected a flimsy bucket when I received this. But it’s actually really durable. The bucket is pretty thick and worked very well for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Seems plenty thick at 70mils, HDPE #2 (best food grade) plastic, BPA free; only needed it to sit on but 70mils seems fine for that!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Bucket from Nantucket
customer_reviews.text: This bucket changed my life. I know know who I am and where I belong.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: It does what buckets do.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes a family just needs a big old bucket. This bucket buckets like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: bobby

customer_reviews.title: It's a bucket.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to praise a bucket this expensive but it's a bucket and it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my need
customer_reviews.text: The 5 gallon bucket works perfect for the tool holder I have and keeps things organized.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good for many ideas
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bucket. There are a lot of things you can put in a bucket. You could put paint. You could put pebbles. You could put water balloons. You could put legos. You could put pennies. You could put dirt. I put weeds. It’s a good bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse T

customer_reviews.title: Good buckets
customer_reviews.text: Very good buckets for a cheap price. Mine came directly from Lowe’s which was interesting considering I bought them from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Daykoda

customer_reviews.title: Not able to return after using and not liking the product
customer_reviews.text: This product is not returnable if you use it and then find that it’s not quite what you were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Local Gratitude 907

customer_reviews.title: Good bucket for cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Used this bucket to put a tool sleeve onto it. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: ...it's a bucket
customer_reviews.text: Typical sturdy plastic bucket. Does the job. Delivered in a Lowe's box.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and solid White  Great for projects
customer_reviews.text: This was the only 5gal yrue White bucket I could find online at a reasonable price. Used it to create a DIY DJ Marshmallow helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Outkasted24

customer_reviews.title: No cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I usually would just get an empty paint bucket. But then I would have to clean it. I like this choice better. I am using the one I bought for tools, but these are heavy duty buckets that could be used for great many purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy bucket!
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for most applications, it is sturdy, durable and affordable. It says BPs free on the bucket and compatible with storing food items as well. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kara

customer_reviews.title: Strong food grade buckets
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these for dyeing cotton fabric and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buckets can do so many things.
customer_reviews.text: Go to YouTube and look up DIY bucket water filter. Wandering with the wattsons. It was a simple and awesome project.
customer_reviews.author: wandering with the Wattsons

customer_reviews.title: Made in the U.S.A. !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of the buckets. I use it around the yard for various jobs. I turned the bucket over, Googled the company and thanked them for making a quality bucket in the U.S.A.No more dollar store buckets for me. I like the 3.5 gallon easier for me to lug around.
customer_reviews.author: patricia Matawan New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Neat-o?
customer_reviews.text: What a... cool bucket? I really do not know. How does one compliment a bucket? All I ever did with it was use it to hold dirty fish tank water.
customer_reviews.author: Jinx

customer_reviews.title: Good bucket
customer_reviews.text: sturdy, well reinforced. Perfectly good for general purpose household use.
customer_reviews.author: Informed Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Handy to have a large bucket to collect dead-headed clippings
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Keating

customer_reviews.title: Nice cheap bucket
customer_reviews.text: The condition upon arrival was perfect, and so far it has worked exactly according to my need: to fill with dirty fishtank water, and then fill with clean water and dump into the tank. The bottom bows down a bit when it is more than 3/4 full, but it doesn't seem to affect the structural integrity and hasn't been a problem. Otherwise it feels pretty solid and well made, though a bit rough around the edges (underneath the lip). Exactly what I wanted in a cheap bucket-
customer_reviews.author: Doug and Jess Hughes

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: sturdy bucket; great price ...just wish they came with lids
customer_reviews.author: C. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy Material
customer_reviews.text: Thick plastic bucket. It's food grade and very hardy. Doesn't come with a lid but thats not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bucket
customer_reviews.text: I wrapped the Custom LeatherCraft Bucket Pockets around the bucket to organize my tools. The bucket itself holds additional tools. They make a nice combination.
customer_reviews.author: Enigma Phi

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice buckets. They're sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice buckets. They're sturdy and strong, but not too heavy. They survived the temperature changes of winter with no problems. I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Great Bucket
customer_reviews.text: I use this bucket dang near every day for mopping. It's sturdy, easy to clean, easy to haul, fits in a standard sink and fits a regular mop with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Searle

customer_reviews.title: What can I say !
customer_reviews.text: It's a bucket, not much you can write on the subject! Sturdy and the perfect size for the tool organizer I bought for my gardening implements
customer_reviews.author: C. wolpe

customer_reviews.title: Lid needs to be purchased separately
customer_reviews.text: Great bucket for heavy-duty needs. Unfortunately, there’s no lid included.
customer_reviews.author: QueenB

customer_reviews.title: It's a bucket!
customer_reviews.text: A bucket is a bucket. What else do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with a top
customer_reviews.text: To much money for just a bucket I expected it to come with a top
customer_reviews.author: solomonsmith

customer_reviews.title: Bucket for snow salt
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about a bucket? This one seems very sturdy and serves its purpose. Four more words required.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: White plastic Bucket
customer_reviews.text: Use this white plastic bucket to carry tools or liquids when gardening.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Costales

customer_reviews.title: A bucket is a bucket
customer_reviews.text: A bucket is a bucket, what more can I say? Seems well made. A decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: This bucket saved my life, and helped me win the lottery
customer_reviews.text: How do you really write a review about a bucket? It took a bullet for me back in Nam. It's a bucket. It holds water, and I use it to wash my cars. The handle works, and it's white. Oh, and it's made out of the NASA approved shuttle plastic type material, so it works in zero gravity!!! Oh, it also doubles as a little step up ladder. If you flip it upside down, you can gain about 8-12" in height!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nuke X

customer_reviews.title: Grit guard fits
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small wash bucket for my bikes. Plus to add a grit guard to the sand and muck of the wash pad. This bucket is perfect, the base is the same as a regular 5 gallon bucket. Grit guard had no problem fitting and I didn't have trim it either.
customer_reviews.author: N Vo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy canoe storage pail
customer_reviews.text: I won't use this for painting but add the screw on lid for storing food and other smelly stuff while on canoe touring trips. I still use pulleys to pull them up onto a provided storage cross bar or find an isolated limb well away from the tree trunk. I can get them cheaper at Big R Stores but not sure if those are as sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Liz-ard

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket, maybe a little too shallow
customer_reviews.text: The 3.5 gallon bucket works great for washing my car, but I probably should've gone with a 5 gallon instead. Either way these work great. I use 3 of them when I wash my car. 1 Soapy water, 2nd for clear rinse water, and 3rd for wheels only. I highly recommend using the Grit Gard that goes in the bottom of the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Best for Condo Gardening
customer_reviews.text: I got this when I decided to take of my indoor/outdoor plants at my condo in a more organized way. I bought the pail and a separate tool caddy that goes around the top. Now, I can go to any part of my home or patio and have all my tools and a place to put potting soil so its not all over the place. This is working out great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Teve

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket.
customer_reviews.text: This bucket is the perfect size for washing the car. If any grit or grim is left inside is just rinses right out with the hose. If you used something with an oil base it might stick to the side a bit but a washcloth wipes it right off. Great buy. Recommend buying buying the grit guard with the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: E. Heide

customer_reviews.title: It's a bucket. It works.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bucket to hold soapy water when washing my cars. It does that, and it even holds my cleaning supplies when it's not actively holding water. Basically, it's a bucket that works.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bucket
customer_reviews.text: This is my bucket, their are many like it, but this one is mine..This bucket is white, and it you clean it ..it will maintain its luster... Its usually the first thing I show people in my back yard ... My pride and joy .. My bucket
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Needed a half bucket for chores and these are just right. Good quality with solid handles and sturdy plastic build, not some flimsy bucket. Makes it easier to handle when full since they are smaller depth wise but still a nice big bucket diameter wise. Will be getting more!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: No Lid
customer_reviews.text: The description does not say it comes with a lid, but enough reviews mentioned the lid that I thought there would be one. Luckily the lids for 5 gallon buckets you can buy at Lowes or Home Depot fit.
customer_reviews.author: CTF Mom

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made bucket, sturdy. Should last a long time. The size is more convenient than the 5 gallon buckets they sell.
customer_reviews.author: N. Colonna

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket
customer_reviews.text: I hate using 5 gal buckets when I work in my yard. This bucket is a perfect size. I carry water from my rain barrels in it and the bucket of water is not too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just right for my needs in the garden. Sturdy and easy to keep clean. I'm glad I bought it you should too
customer_reviews.author: Ann Larsen

customer_reviews.title: bucket
customer_reviews.text: nice size bucket. seems sturdy enough for keeping up with the garage chores and car chores. Our last bucket cracked and leaked this seems much more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: G. Glaser

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good price
customer_reviews.text: This bucket does what it needs to do. Coupled with the Gamma2 lid, it's a great storage solution for things that you want protected from the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon C.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is just a basic bucket. It does what it does. it buckets. it hasn't broken, and is simple, cheap, works for anything you need a bucket for!
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Why did I buy this?
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced. Your better off going to any hardware store. You'll pay much less and they're built with stronger plastic than this.
customer_reviews.author: E. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Gave as part of a gift
customer_reviews.text: Paid more than if I purchased in a store but this bucket was plain without any logo. Gave them as a gift as part of a garden themed gift. Hopefully she liked it.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyBunny20

customer_reviews.title: Industrial Bucket
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and falls into my category of "well worth the purchase." It has surpassed what I would have expected
customer_reviews.author: iouone2005

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bucket
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for use when washing my car, and they do a great job. Definitely a well built product that I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joe N

customer_reviews.title: great garden storage
customer_reviews.text: I love this with the seat and garden tool wrap. I store things like gloves inside and my tools on the outside. My husband wishes he had one.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Nice bucket !
customer_reviews.text: Nice size , sturdy, plastic is very washable . I use it to soak and wash my horses supplies and my horse ! Handle is comfortable to lift .
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Very successful at being a bucket
customer_reviews.text: Look, it's a bucket, how revealing is this review going to be anyway? The bucket is fairly well made, though I wouldn't call it rock-solid because it's a plastic bucket, not a bucket made of rocks. It holds liquid fine, the handle is pretty sturdy, and the price was reasonable. As a bucket, it's very successful at being a thing that you can put other things in. My only complaint is that it didn't come with a lid, which would have been nice. If you're looking for a bucket, or some thing to put things in, this works.
customer_reviews.author: James Z.

customer_reviews.title: Bucket it buckets of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very versitile, I've used it for a step stool, an ottoman, beer holder, and *gasp* a bucket. Mr. Bucket it buckets of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jay H.

customer_reviews.title: A bucket
customer_reviews.text: It's a bucket.. What else can I say? It holds my flour. This bucket did not come with a lid.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Fleck

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy bucket.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking around for a small bucket to do my car washes with. This is perfect. It might be a bit shallow, but I think it's just right.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Eng

customer_reviews.title: It's a bucket.
customer_reviews.text: Really as it says. A white bucket with a handle. I only bought it online because they ran out of them at Walmart. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: (Michelle)

customer_reviews.title: No lid
customer_reviews.text: Its a solid bucket, but either I didn't notice it said no lid, or it doesn't say. But-just so you know-there's no lid.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne 🌺☠️🌃

customer_reviews.title: Bucket
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for, a study 5 gallon bucket to hand wash clothes in. It fulfills its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Pennylove

customer_reviews.title: A bucket is just a bucket ?
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is. But this brand seems to be of good quality and therefore durable. Add to it Amazon`s excellent service [ and price ! ] and you might realize that just a bucket can make your day !
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: Useful bucket
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for carrying dirt, water, bareroot plants, fertilizer, tools and many other gardening tasks. The extra large size makes it especially useful.
customer_reviews.author: Listening

customer_reviews.title: it's a bucket
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say , it's a bucket of very high quality at a reasonable price. We use them with Gammaseal lids for storing supply's.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Perkins

customer_reviews.title: white bucket
customer_reviews.text: Its a white bucket. I ordered it and got it. It holds stuff like I needed it too. OOOOOOHHHH!! Yeah.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for washing the car
customer_reviews.text: Grit guard does fit this bucket. Perfect size for washing the car. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Ghiotto

customer_reviews.title: Hold your breath
customer_reviews.text: This is a medium sized bucket, that is of good construction w/ a sturdy handle. I like to fill it w/ water, then do a handstand over top it & dunk my head under the water. So far I've only been able to stay under like 2 minutes, but w/ your cheers & support I'm sure I'll see the 3 minute mark soon enough
customer_reviews.author: Cole Carson

customer_reviews.title: Solid pail.
customer_reviews.text: These pails were more hefty/solid than I anticipated, which turns out to be a good thing! Also came with lids, which I was not expecting as it did not say that in the ad. Anyway, great pail for the money - should last me forever as I am using these for water changes in my aquariums. These make life much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a weird surprise for my x-wife and mother of my children. She loves gardening so this should make her smile. Excellent quality, arrived quicker than expected, well packaged. Could not be happier. Hope she will get a lot of good use from it.
customer_reviews.author: BillM

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and received the product in quick fashion, as expected. Everything went well and no complaints whatsoever. Will consider the product and merchant in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good pail
customer_reviews.text: A good pail that has many uses. I plan on using it for a variety of things it will come in handy especially during a power outage I can use it to carry water, wash clothes, dishes etc.....
customer_reviews.author: D. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I got the padded lid to go on this new clean bucket so I can easily do the weeding in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

product_meta.title: Encore Plastics 50640 Industrial Plastic 70-Mil with Handle, 5-Gallon, Pail White
product_meta.description:
Size Name:5 GallonThis item is a Encore Plastics 50640 Industrial Plastic 70-Mil with Handle, 5-Gallon, Pail White. Purpose of use for Painting Supplies, wallpaper-hand-tools. This product is manufactured in United States. Fits Lid: 50000, 53000, 53000B, 50400, 50700, 50800, 82124, 82136.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Encore pails are molded from a low melt HDPE to ensure the best possible impact strength and resistance to cracking. Each pail is designed with reinforced saturn rings around the top to prevent distortion when carried.
